title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 34.14 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 34.14 - Enforcement

State Regulations

Pursuant to section
317
of the

Insurance Law, an insurance company that fails to comply with any of the
provisions of articles 6 and 8 of the Vehicle and Traffic Law and/or the
regulations promulgated by the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles pursuant to this

Part or Part 32 of this Title, shall be subject to the fines set forth in
section
317
of the

Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
34.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
